mapper.select: /* gallery - galleryList */ SELECT g_num, g_name, g_subject, g_content, g_thumb, g_file, to_char(g_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as g_date FROM spring_gallery ORDER BY g_num DESC
SELECT g_num, g_name, g_subject, g_content, g_thumb, g_file, TO_CHAR(g_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS g_date FROM spring_gallery WHERE g_num = #{g_num}
mapper.delete: /* gallery - galleryDelete */ DELETE FROM spring_gallery WHERE g_num = #{g_num}
